title: Is the Modi Govt Guilty of Assassinating a Canadian Citizen? A Former RAW Chief Responds to Trudeau
selftext:
Never seen Thapar so angry in any interview. He was almost short of saying "ACCEPT YOU INDIAN BASTARD ACCEPT!"

I thought that he played devil's advocate as his show had respected him ..that faÃ§ade has been exposed.
comments:
Why is Thapar so angry ? 

He shifts from whether RAW could have done an assassination to whether RAW is supporting separatist in Pakistan  and such it can do assassination. This are entirely different events separated by decades.

He felt more like Arnab here.

Thapar was in holier than thou, whiter than white, more loyal than king mode.

The opposition minister himself has said that Trudeau has not presented any evidence.. but Thapar's every question is like according to the evidence presented by Trudeau ðŸ«¡
